dataSet.name: IncomeStatement
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED AccountTypes.Ref AS AccountType, GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account AS Account, GeneralJournalTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, CASE WHEN NOT GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account IS NULL THEN -GeneralJournalTurnovers.AmountRCTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCTurnover, CASE WHEN NOT GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account IS NULL THEN -GeneralJournalTurnovers.AmountRCOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCOpeningBalance, CASE WHEN NOT GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account IS NULL THEN -GeneralJournalTurnovers.AmountRCClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCClosingBalance, CASE WHEN GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccumulatedDepreciation), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccountsReceivable), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherCurrentAsset), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Inventory), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccountsPayable), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherCurrentLiability)) THEN "OPERATING ACTIVITIES" WHEN GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.FixedAsset), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherNonCurrentAsset)) THEN "INVESTING ACTIVITIES" WHEN GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.LongTermLiability), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Equity)) THEN "FINANCING ACTIVITIES" ELSE "" END AS ActivitiesType {SELECT AccountType.*, Account.*, Recorder, YearPeriod, QuarterPeriod, MonthPeriod, WeekPeriod, DayPeriod} FROM AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal.BalanceAndTurnovers( , , Auto, , NOT Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank)) AND Account.OtherComprehensiveIncome = FALSE, , ) AS GeneralJournalTurnovers FULL JOIN Enum.AccountTypes AS AccountTypes ON (AccountTypes.Ref = GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.AccountType) WHERE NOT AccountTypes.Ref IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank)) {WHERE AccountTypes.Ref AS AccountType, GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account AS Account, GeneralJournalTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, GeneralJournalTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod}

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

v8:item.v8:content: Net cash provided by OPERATING ACTIVITIES
Net cash provided by Net cash provided by [ActivitiesType][ActivitiesType]
Adjustments to reconcile Net Income to Net Cash provided by operations:

parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")
